moisturizers.overview: A rich, non-greasy moisturizing cream that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier. Ideal for normal to dry skin types.
moisturizers.ingredients: Purified Water, Glycerin, Ceteareth-20, Petrolatum, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Carbomer, Dimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Dipotassium Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin
moisturizers.howTo:
Apply generous amount to clean face and neck
Massage in upward circular motions
Allow full absorption before next step
moisturizers.whyEffective: Formulated with ceramides and hyaluronic acid to restore and maintain the skin's natural barrier while providing long-lasting hydration.

moisturizers.overview: A lightweight, non-comedogenic daily moisturizer that provides long-lasting hydration for normal to combination skin. Dermatologist recommended for sensitive skin.
moisturizers.ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethiconol, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopheryl Acetate
moisturizers.howTo:
Apply moderate amount to face and neck
Pat and massage gently until absorbed
Adjust amount based on seasonal needs
moisturizers.whyEffective: Contains hyaluronic acid that holds up to 1000 times its weight in water, providing optimal hydration without heaviness.

moisturizers.productName: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Moisturizer
moisturizers.overview: An oil-free, lightweight moisturizer that provides essential ceramides and niacinamide to restore the skin barrier and reduce sensitivity. Perfect for oily and sensitive skin.
moisturizers.ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Niacinamide, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Carbomer, Triethyl Citrate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Capryloyl Glycine, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, T-butyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin
moisturizers.howTo:
Apply thin layer to face and neck
Pat gently until absorbed, avoid T-zone
Use morning and evening after treatments
moisturizers.whyEffective: Oil-free formula with niacinamide and ceramides provides essential hydration while controlling excess oil production.

moisturizers.productName: Aveeno Calm + Restore Oat Gel Moisturizer
moisturizers.overview: A lightweight gel-lotion moisturizer with prebiotic oat that helps restore the skin's natural moisture barrier. Ideal for sensitive combination skin that needs balanced hydration.
moisturizers.ingredients: Water, Isopropyl Palmitate, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Polyacrylamide, Phenoxyethanol, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Carbomer, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Laureth-7, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract
moisturizers.howTo:
Apply more product to dry areas
Use lighter amount on areas prone to oiliness
Pat gently until absorbed, adjust as needed
moisturizers.whyEffective: Lightweight gel-lotion hybrid with oat extract balances hydration needs of different areas effectively while soothing sensitive skin.
